title: RSS Feed Reader that saves the feeds of the last 3 days in Google Sheets
author: Holger
readme:
++**How it Works:** ++  
This RSS reader retrieves links from a Google Sheets file and goes through each link to retrieve the messages that are younger than 3 days, then saves them in a second Google Sheets file and then deletes all older entries in the second Google Sheets file!

_**==The retrieval can take a while due to the Google API block prevention, depending on the number of news feeds that were retrieved!==**_

_**Detailed Description is in the sticky Notes from the Workflow!**_
readme_zh:
++ **工作原理：** ++  
本RSS阅读器会从谷歌表格文件中获取链接，逐一访问这些链接并抓取发布时间在3天内的消息，随后将这些消息保存至第二个谷歌表格文件中，并自动清除第二个文件中所有过期的旧条目！

_**==由于谷歌API的防阻塞机制，抓取过程可能耗时较长，具体时长取决于所获取的新闻源数量！==**_

_**工作流程中的置顶注释内有详细说明！**_
title_zh: 将最近3天的RSS订阅内容保存至Google表格的阅读器
